modName: Megumin hat FINAL VERSION Not a saint exclusive
summary: Changes witch hat to Megumin hat. No hair loss issue
descriptionHtml:
EXPLOSION!

there may be some very minor clipping in the back, near the horn of the hat. If you have dark hair this is hardly noticeable.
I will also say that the screenshots do not appear to show the "mouth" going all the way around the hat. I promise that it now does!Â 

I highly suggest you go on steam and find the Megumin explosion magic mod, which comes with voice files. It is superior to using Midas Magic nuke power.

you will need this mod. All credit to mod author YSBKVKUD
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11049

Then replace the textures with my files.

My original attempt on this idea was a failure, but a learning experience. do not look for the old mod, Megumin blew it to dust.

I would like someone to suggest an eyepatch mod I might recolor
author: gethesmain aka Michael Smith
